# <s class="topic-title">[[human survival]]</s>

##### ^blurb

The story of how against most odds human's have survived nature, themselves, and how we will 
persevere to avoid [[human extinction]].

Your or you ancestor's persistence made this a
part of:: [[human experience]]

##### Outline

see:: [[human experience]]
